name: YaGooooo
description:
Help YaGooooo to realize his Dream of an Idol Group and dodge degenerate Terms.

Use the Mouse to control Yagoo:

-left Mouse = Hold Yagoo in place

-right Mouse = Move Yagoo forward

-Mousewheel = Move Yagoo up and down
